data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Potosí, Bolivia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Potosí, Bolivia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Potosí.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 145,950 believers in Potosí against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Potosí, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, inspire Bible translators to communicate the Scriptures accurately in the heart languages spoken in Potosí, Bolivia.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Potosí, Bolivia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Potosí to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.
